docs.lead_paragraph: Update | 12:58 p.m. PBS has postponed the Ron Williams interview, which had been scheduled to run Wednesday. It is now scheduled for Thursday.

headline.main: Aetna Chief Says Public Plan a Distraction

docs.abstract: Aetna's chief executive, in a PBS interview, tells Tavis Smiley that the debate over a public insurance plan is "a distraction."

docs.lead_paragraph: Enjoy those health care town halls? Now, do-it-yourselfers can try one at home. Or at church.

headline.main: A Turnkey Town Hall Health Care Revival

docs.lead_paragraph: Democratic allies begin fanning out across the country on Wednesday in a final end-of-summer heave to demonstrate their support for a health care overhaul.
